mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.zjzmj AS "zjzmj", a.dxjzmj AS "dxjzmj", a.dtjzsl AS "dtjzsl", a.jzgd AS "jzgd"
mapper.select:
SELECT
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.zjzmj AS "zjzmj", a.dxjzmj AS "dxjzmj", a.dtjzsl AS "dtjzsl", a.jzgd AS "jzgd"
FROM ironfo_population a
a.doc_id = #{doc_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_population( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, zjzmj, dxjzmj, dtjzsl, jzgd ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{zjzmj}, #{dxjzmj}, #{dtjzsl}, #{jzgd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_population SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, zjzmj = #{zjzmj}, dxjzmj = #{dxjzmj}, dtjzsl = #{dtjzsl}, jzgd = #{jzgd} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE ironfo_population SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, zjzmj = #{zjzmj}, dxjzmj = #{dxjzmj}, dtjzsl = #{dtjzsl}, jzgd = #{jzgd} WHERE id = #{id}
